title: "‡∑Ü‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑è‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ù‡∂ª‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∑Ö‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑ì" ‡∂∏‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ω‡∑ä ‡∂Ü‡∂ª‡∑î ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂Ø‡∑ä‡∂∞‡∂∫ ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑î ‡∑Ä‡∑ñ ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ß‡∑í ‡∑Ü‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑è ‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∑Ö‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑í
description:
#SF #Fonseka #UNP


"‡∑Ü‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑è‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ù‡∂ª‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∑Ö‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑ì" ‡∂∏‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ω‡∑ä ‡∂Ü‡∂ª‡∑î ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂±‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂ö‡∂©‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂Ø‡∑ä‡∂∞‡∂∫ ‡∑É‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑î ‡∑Ä‡∑ñ ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ß‡∑í ‡∑Ü‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑è ‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∑Ö‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑í 
"‡∂ú‡∑ù‡∂®‡∑è‡∂∑‡∂∫ ‡∂¥‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ä ‡∂Ö‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂ª‡∑î‡∑Ä ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∂±‡∑î ‡∑É‡∑ô‡∂∂‡∑Ö‡∑ô‡∂ö‡∑î‡∂ß ‡∂¥‡∂∫‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∑Ñ‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂∏‡∑ê‡∂ª‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑è" 

The Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) Presidential hopeful is not qualified to make statements on national security even though he talks so much about it, Field Marshall Sarath Fonseka said at a press briefing held last week in Colombo.

The Army chief who led land troops in the final war against the LTTE said he never received any advice from Gotabaya Rajapaksa with regard to the war in his capacity as Defence Secretary.

‚ÄúIn January 2008, I deployed a battalion from Welioya to go towards Mullaitivu. At that time Gotabaya asked me about the possibility of deploying a separate battalion between Mannar and Vavuniya. It was a time when the war was intense in the Mannar front. However, my plan was not to go forward from those ends. But Gotabaya did not understand those plans and he still does not‚Äù Fonseka said.

Fonseka said neither Gotabaya Rajapaksa nor others knew the war strategy against the LTTE.

‚ÄúUntil we captured Kilinochchi and were leading to Puthukudiyiruppu, no one knew what my plan was‚Äù he said.

If his plan was revealed even at the Security Council, it could have been given publicity by the top officials, the Field Marshall explained. ‚ÄúI used to travel to the East, Vavuniya and Jaffna every week during the war. Gotabaya once accompanied me to Jaffna. But as he tells his plans to everybody before hand, the terrorists knew we were coming and started firing artillery to Palaly when we tried to land. So we had to turn back‚Äù he said.

He said, ‚ÄúI saw Gotabaya‚Äôs comments recently on the war that having an army of more than 500,000 and attacking the LTTE from the four sides was the secret behind the war victory. It is an answer even a waiter in a military base would give. The army never reached 500,000. It was mere 350,000 including the Tri-Forces, Police and the Civil Defence Force all together while the Army was only about 200,000‚Äù. Fonseka assured that he will work for the victory of the New Democratic Front Presidential candidate, Sajith Premadasa, even if he is not given the Ministry of Defence in a future government under Premadasa. ‚ÄúIt never was my request. I think he (Sajith Premadasa) has identified that we cannot be satisfied with the current security level of the country‚Äù Fonseka said.
tags: Neth News Swaranavahini News L@7 NewsFirst SLRC News Presidential Election 2020

comments.author: Abhimanya Roshan

comments.comment: Matanam lankaawe desapalakayo gana thiyenne puduma tharahak Saha asoochi dakkama athiwena apulak, mokakda mey desapaluwanta piliwan bathkana Karin gookkannath, echacharatama mun uru ralak, pahu hiya dawas Wala API dakka , apita ahuna FONSEKA Sajith gana kiyaapu Katha(monawa unath samahara dewal aththa) Sajith dinnoth Fonsekata Defence amathikama denna porondu unata passe Sajith hondai, as kiyanne mey booths desapalakayo kiyana dewal mahajanaya piligatha yuthui, matanam Rajapaksalagenwath Premadasalagenwath wadak naha, namuth Fonsekagen yamak asiya yuthui Kiya Maya sithuna, obage hadawathata ekangawa kiyanna, Rajapaksala rate palanaya baragaththe Nathan lankaawe minissu thama danne naha kawda SARATH FONSEKA kiyanne kawda kiyala, Ada oba owani Katha kiyannath othenta Enna Maha paaduney Rajapaksala miss neyda? Kawada Hari oya katinma thamai aayeth Sajith Premadasage palu arinne, ehema neyda? Oba owani Katha kiyana Vita owata jayawewa kiyala kagahana Amana gobbayanuth innawa, matanam meywage Katha ahannath pulai, oba daksa soldaduwek bawa mama eka helama piligannawa, obage pahath waiter prakasa oba darana thanathuruwalata nogalapena bawa mage viswasayai, GOOWALAKATA WATUNATH SARAMA KASAPATA GAHAGENA HARI MAHATHMAYEK LESA KATAYUTHU KIREEMATA NUWANA LABEYWA, FONSEKA mahaththayo oba oya Kara jeerna desa palanaya kalath oba sresta soldaduwek Kiya sithata aragena obage oya Sri Mikayla hasuruwanna sithata ganna, Evita oba anagathayedith RANAVIRU FONSEKAYA!
